name: galactic-key
effect: Grants access to Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.
short_effect: Grants access to Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A card key for disengaging the security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A card key for disengaging the security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.
